inclusion.criterion: willing and able to provide informed consent, undergo and comply with all study assessments and adhere to the protocol schedule
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: significant enhancing mass on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence for tumor recurrence or progression by MRI scan after failing prior surgical resection, biopsy, chemotherapy or radiation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: baseline MRI performed within 24 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ability to undergo endovascular treatment based on Doppler studies showing internal carotid artery (ICA) that is less than 50% occluded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tumors must be surgically resectable at the time of baseline evaluation and craniotomy for tumor resection would be part of their standard medical care
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: tumors must be > 1.0 cm in diameter with upper limit of 5 cm maximal diameter
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: histology other than astrocytoma grade IV (GBM or gliosarcoma)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: tumor foci detected below the tentorium or beyond the cranial vault
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain.
